content:
Hello all,

I've made a pull request draft on a fix that specifically targets Windows. Is there a way to make the tests run a Windows version of the toolchain and the associated tests?
(More specifically I'm looking to make it run the MSVC toolchain, and perhaps to some testing using terminal in Windows, as that's where the bug was found.

a) execute them locally if you have a windows machine
b) if you're really unsure whether the PR is correct and need the CI to make progress on it you can temporarily rebuild the CI yaml to enable windows runners on PRs
c) wait for review and approval and let windows CI run on merge
